00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief Switches and hex leds driver for debug purposes.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief drv_debug.v
00030 */
00031 module drv_debug(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input           CLK_I,
00035     input           reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name Internal debug signals

00039     //% @{
00040     input [31:2]    master_adr_o,
00041     input [31:0]    debug_pc,
00042     input [7:0]     debug_syscon,
00043     input [7:0]     debug_track,
00044     //% @}
00045     
00046     //% \name Switches and hex leds hardware interface

00047     //% @{
00048     // hex output
00049     output [7:0]    hex0,
00050     output [7:0]    hex1,
00051     output [7:0]    hex2,
00052     output [7:0]    hex3,
00053     output [7:0]    hex4,
00054     output [7:0]    hex5,
00055     output [7:0]    hex6,
00056     output [7:0]    hex7,
00057     // switches input
00058     input           debug_sw_pc,
00059     input           debug_sw_adr
00060     //% @}
00061 );
00062 
00063 assign hex0 =
00064     (display[3:0] == 4'd0) ?    ~8'b00111111 :
00065     (display[3:0] == 4'd1) ?    ~8'b00000110 :
00066     (display[3:0] == 4'd2) ?    ~8'b01011011 :
00067     (display[3:0] == 4'd3) ?    ~8'b01001111 :
00068     (display[3:0] == 4'd4) ?    ~8'b01100110 :
00069     (display[3:0] == 4'd5) ?    ~8'b01101101 :
00070     (display[3:0] == 4'd6) ?    ~8'b01111101 :
00071     (display[3:0] == 4'd7) ?    ~8'b00000111 :
00072     (display[3:0] == 4'd8) ?    ~8'b01111111 :
00073     (display[3:0] == 4'd9) ?    ~8'b01101111 :
00074     (display[3:0] == 4'd10) ?   ~8'b01110111 :
00075     (display[3:0] == 4'd11) ?   ~8'b01111100 :
00076     (display[3:0] == 4'd12) ?   ~8'b00111001 :
00077     (display[3:0] == 4'd13) ?   ~8'b01011110 :
00078     (display[3:0] == 4'd14) ?   ~8'b01111001 :
00079                                 ~8'b01110001;

00081     (display[7:4] == 4'd0) ?    ~8'b00111111 :

00182 assign hex7 =
00183     (display[31:28] == 4'd0) ?  ~8'b00111111 :
00184     (display[31:28] == 4'd1) ?  ~8'b00000110 :
00185     (display[31:28] == 4'd2) ?  ~8'b01011011 :
00186     (display[31:28] == 4'd3) ?  ~8'b01001111 :
00187     (display[31:28] == 4'd4) ?  ~8'b01100110 :
00188     (display[31:28] == 4'd5) ?  ~8'b01101101 :
00189     (display[31:28] == 4'd6) ?  ~8'b01111101 :
00190     (display[31:28] == 4'd7) ?  ~8'b00000111 :
00191     (display[31:28] == 4'd8) ?  ~8'b01111111 :
00192     (display[31:28] == 4'd9) ?  ~8'b01101111 :
00193     (display[31:28] == 4'd10) ? ~8'b01110111 :
00194     (display[31:28] == 4'd11) ? ~8'b01111100 :
00195     (display[31:28] == 4'd12) ? ~8'b00111001 :
00196     (display[31:28] == 4'd13) ? ~8'b01011110 :
00197     (display[31:28] == 4'd14) ? ~8'b01111001 :
00198                                 ~8'b01110001;
00199 reg [31:0] display;
00200 
00201 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00202     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00203         display <= 32'd0;
00204     end
00205     else begin
00206         if(debug_sw_pc == 1'b1)         display <= debug_pc;
00207         else if(debug_sw_adr == 1'b1)   display <= {master_adr_o[31:2], 2'b00 };
00208         else                            display <= { debug_track, 16'd0, debug_syscon };
00209     end
00210 end
00211 endmodule
00212 
00213 // ---------------- general DEBUG
00214 /*
00215 wire debug_write;
00216 assign debug_write =    master1_cyc_o == 1'b1 && master1_stb_o == 1'b1 && master1_we_o == 1'b0 && master1_adr_o != last_addr &&
00217                         ({master1_adr_o[31:2], 2'b00} >= 32'h00DFF000) && ({master1_adr_o[31:2], 2'b00} <= 32'h00DFF01C);
00218 
00219 reg [11:0] debug_addr;
00220 reg [31:2] last_addr;
00221 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00222     if(reset_n == 1'b0)                                         last_addr <= 30'd0;
00223     else                                                        last_addr <= master1_adr_o;                           
00224 end
00225 
00226 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00227     if(reset_n == 1'b0)                                       debug_addr <= 12'd0;
00228     else if(debug_write == 1'b1 //&& debug_addr < 12'd4095//) debug_addr <= debug_addr + 12'd1;
00229 end
00230 
00231 altsyncram debug_ram_inst(
00232     .clock0(clk_30),
00233 
00234     .address_a(debug_addr),
00235     .wren_a(debug_write == 1'b1),
00236     .data_a( { 3'b0, master1_adr_o[8:2], 2'b00} ),
00237     .q_a()
00238 );
00239 defparam 
00240     debug_ram_inst.operation_mode = "SINGLE_PORT",
00241     debug_ram_inst.width_a = 12,
00242     debug_ram_inst.lpm_hint = "ENABLE_RUNTIME_MOD=YES,INSTANCE_NAME=mem",
00243     debug_ram_inst.widthad_a = 12;
00244 */
00245 
00246 /*
00247 // ----------------------------- copper DEBUG
00248 wire debug_write;
00249 assign debug_write = (state == S_SAVE && ACK_I == 1'b1);
00250 
00251 reg [7:0] debug_addr;
00252 always @(posedge CLK_I) begin
00253     if(line_start == 1'b1 && line_number == 9'd0)   debug_addr <= 8'd0;
00254     else if(debug_write == 1'b1 && debug_addr < 8'd255) debug_addr <= debug_addr + 8'd1;
00255 end
00256 
00257 altsyncram debug_ram_inst(
00258     .clock0(CLK_I),
00259 
00260     .address_a(debug_addr),
00261     .wren_a(debug_write == 1'b1),
00262     .data_a({3'b0, line_number, ir}),
00263     .q_a()
00264 );
00265 defparam 
00266     debug_ram_inst.operation_mode = "SINGLE_PORT",
00267     debug_ram_inst.width_a = 60,
00268     debug_ram_inst.lpm_hint = "ENABLE_RUNTIME_MOD=YES,INSTANCE_NAME=cop",
00269     debug_ram_inst.widthad_a = 8;
00270 */
